lead_paragraph: Jamaican discus thrower Jason Morgan's appeal to sport's highest court to secure a place at the Rio Olympics despite not coming in the top three in his national trials will be heard on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: CAS to Hear Rio Appeal by Jamaican Discus Thrower
headline.main: CAS to Hear Rio Appeal by Jamaican Discus Thrower

snippet: Jamaican discus thrower Jason Morgan's appeal to sport's highest court to secure a place at the Rio Olympics despite not coming in the top three in his national trials will be heard on Tuesday....
